Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
game.characters.Entity
game.characters.Enemy
public class Enemy extends Entity
Represents an enemy that automatically performs attacks on the player.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class game.characters.Entity

    attackList, identifier, stats

  • Constructor Details

    • Enemy

      public Enemy(String newIdentifier)
      Constructs an enemy from a JSON file using JsonMapper.
      Parameters:
      newIdentifier - the string identifier of the enemy. Must match the name of the JSON file.

  • Method Details

    • performAttackTo

      public void performAttackTo(Entity target)
      Performs an attack on a target using a randomly selected attack.
      Parameters:
      target - the entity that receives the damage.

    • getEnemyType

      public EnemyType getEnemyType()
      Gets the type of the enemy.
